Body:
lb1 = DefaultLabels.MARKUP_PREFIX + '.title'
lb2 = DefaultLabels.MARKUP_PREFIX + '.menu'
doc = make_doc([10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10, 10], None, None, [None, None, lb1,
    lb1, lb2, lb2, [lb1, lb2]])
filtr = LabelFusion()
is_changed = filtr.process(doc)
block_idxs = [(block.offset_blocks_start, block.offset_blocks_end) for
    block in doc.text_blocks]
assert block_idxs == [(0, 1), (2, 3), (4, 5), (6, 6)]
assert is_changed is True
